purpose: The email is a call for participation and contribution to the SEMLA 2025 symposium taking place in Montreal from June 17 to June 19, 2025.
evidence_sentences: The eighth edition of the Software Engineering for Machine Learning Applications (SEMLA) symposium will take place at Polytechnique Montréal, Montréal, Canada, from June 17 to June 19, 2025.
SEMLA brings together leading experts in software engineering and machine learning to discuss the challenges of developing complex data-intensive software systems.
We invite practitioners and researchers from all related fields to participate.
More information about posters and submission: https://semla.polymtl.ca/call-for-posters/
Registration Details Early Registration Deadline: June 6th, 2025
